content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #93794 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

this happens on nightly, I think it warrants a P-high because of the error message. I'm slightly confused, though, about whether the compiler should infer the type or not.

By reading this sentence ("Instead of explaining that it cannot infer the type (which can be understandable given some update in the library"), I understand that it is ok that now the type inference fails?
